channel.title: Linux,Windows,自启动,安装,U盘 on sam的小窝

item.title: 在Linux上制作Windows自启动安装U盘
item.description: 在Linux上制作Windows自启动安装U盘 官网在此 Features Support Legacy PC/UEFI booting Support FAT32 and NTFS filesystems Support using physical installation disc or disk image as source Supported Windows® installation images Windows Vista and later Any language or edition variants Windows PE Run
